RelatedSentence: Styrodur insulating panels produced at BASFÂ’s plant in Tudela , Spain , are now made exclusively with the polymeric flame retardant , which has a superior environmental profile while offering the same flame retardancy .
In 2011 , BASF announced its determination to switch to the new flame retardant in close cooperation with its customers .
BASF is also already using PolyFR in the majority of its range of expandable polystyrene ( EPS ) products .

A1: The changeover of all EPS grades in Europe
RelatedSentence: The changeover was preceded by an intensive testing phase together with EPS customers .
